title: Fragment, 16th century
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 58 x 54 cm (22 13/16 x 21 1/4 in.)
description: Blue damask with a medium-scale design of a symmetrical floral spray in a continuous angular ogival framework of decorated bands clasped by two dotted rings at tangent points. Two broad coarse satin selvages of faded pink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 16th century. Medium: silk
Technique: 5-harness satin damask. 1953-162-51.
